Translations.Text: Let vzor ja set for the dalej generations bol dobre
Robit mna 1 inheritors blissful Raj
A forgive moj otca for he ist astray
Nie forsake mi Dni Vzkriesenie
Ze je dni when neither peniaze nor dieta pomoc
Len those pojdem GOD ich whole srdce will saved
Raj presented the righteous
Hell set strayers
They ziadat Kde bol idols ona kult
beside GOD they pomoc ona ihned? they pomoc
They thrown therein dohromady strayers
all z Satan's vojak
They say mat rad they feud therein
By GOD my bol daleko astray
Ako my set ona could rank Lord universe
Those zmylit us bol zlomyselny
Teraz my nie have intercessors
Nor single koniec znamy
Len my get iny chance my potom verit
This bol dobry lekcia. Vela ludia nie bol believers
Tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Ludia Noah disbelieved posol
Ich brat Noah said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona any wage Moj wage pod z Lord universe
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
They said Ako my verit ona mozem when zly among us nasledovat ona
